feed.title: The way to successfully prepare the Ph.D. application for the US/Canada/Europe
feed.subtitle: Thank you for visiting my Website. I hope you enjoy my Webstie and get a myriad of informative information via Website, YouTube, and Presentation. Feel free to ask me if you have a question regarding preparing PhD application for study abroad.

entry.title: Welcome to Hyejeong‚Äôs Website!
entry.content:
Hi, folks! It is my pleasure to have you visit my website. Here are the materials that I presented during the Yonsei Mentoring Session on October 11th. Thank you for having me. If you have future questions with regard to my PhD application, feel free to contact me via my email address(hyejeongchoi22@gmail.com). Have a great day! üôÉ

entry.title: YouTube_Yonsei Mentoring
entry.content:
How to successfully apply for PhD program to study abroad: Step by Step

As a graduate student at Younsei University, you might be considering studying abroad as a PhD student. Here are the systematical steps to prepare for your application targeting the US, Canada, or Europe. I will share my viewpoint and experience while preparing for PhD application in Canada. I hope you enjoy the video and get instructive information from my YouTube. Cross your fingers!ü§ûüèª
